description.full: Play Team Deathmatch and Domination on three incredibly diverse Multiplayer Maps: Strike Zone, Warhawk and Prison Break. Experience the brand new Create-a-soldier system, which allows you to customize your character, and build your loadout using a variety of new perks, new weapons and new killstreaks.   This Free Demo also gives you access to Extinction - a completely new 1-4 player co-op game mode where you fight hordes of aliens, featuring a unique blend of fast-paced survival gameplay, base defense, player customization and class leveling.  Purchase the full game digital download for a limited time for a discounted price.
description.short: Play Team Deathmatch and Domination on three incredibly diverse Multiplayer Maps: Strike Zone, Warhawk and Prison Break.
